mapper.select:
SELECT OSA.id, OSA.idCardType, OSA.idCardNumber, OSA.idCardExpiryDate, OSA.lastUpdateDate, OSA.realNameAuthenticated, OSA.realNameErrCount, OSA.realNameLastErrDate, OSA.email, OSA.emailBinding, OSA.createDate, OSA.mobileNumber, OSA.mobileBinding, OSA.operatorId FROM OPER_SECURITY_ACCOUNT OSA WHERE
AND OSA.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_SECURITY_ACCOUNT ( id, idCardType, idCardNumber, idCardExpiryDate, lastUpdateDate, realNameAuthenticated, realNameErrCount, realNameLastErrDate, email, emailBinding, createDate, mobileNumber, mobileBinding, operatorId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idCardType}, #{idCardNumber}, #{idCardExpiryDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{realNameAuthenticated}, #{realNameErrCount}, #{realNameLastErrDate}, #{email}, #{emailBinding}, #{createDate}, #{mobileNumber}, #{mobileBinding}, #{operatorId} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_SECURITY_ACCOUNT WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_SECURITY_ACCOUNT
idCardType = #{idCardType,javaType=com.tx.local.basicdata.model.IDCardTypeEnum},
idCardNumber = #{idCardNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
idCardExpiryDate = #{idCardExpiryDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
realNameAuthenticated = #{realNameAuthenticated,javaType=boolean},
realNameErrCount = #{realNameErrCount,javaType=int},
realNameLastErrDate = #{realNameLastErrDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
email = #{email,javaType=java.lang.String},
emailBinding = #{emailBinding,javaType=boolean},
mobileNumber = #{mobileNumber,javaType=java.lang.String},
mobileBinding = #{mobileBinding,javaType=boolean},
operatorId = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
